verbLexeme: 1. To have features that cause people or animals to come close. English = attract.
2. Of people, to cause another person to like you (especially sexually) and want to be with your or close to you. English = attract, seduce.
3. To succeed in making someone you have not met before want you sexually and to succeed in initiating such an encounter. Informal English = pick up someone.
4. To catch someone's attention or affections.
